archimate:Capability.name: Frameworks & Methodologies
archimate:Capability.documentation:
The ability to define, manage and continuously improve the tools, methods and approaches used within the practice. From a technology perspective this capability includes the selection, implementation and administration of key practice tools and the guidance in the use of those tools. It also includes the identification, implementation and tailoring of methodologies and approaches to suit the need of the organisation and the development of guidance in their use.
Outcomes:
Consistency in practice engagement, activities and deliverables Clear guidance and support in the use of tools, methods and practices
